name: Zombie Soccer (itch)
description:
You are an aspiring soccer player who wants to become the greatest soccer player in the world. Well it's not that hard anymore, since you're living in a zombie apocalypse. Question is, can you still score?

Game produce for Ludum Dare 41: Combine 2 incompatible genres
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/zombie-soccer

Controls

Arrow keys to move
Space to kick the ball

Art, Code and Music
Jack Le Hamster
